translations: （天）海豚座（北天星座之一）；海豚属

sentences.sentence: He was there to witness the crash in population of the common dolphin (Delphinus delphis) from 150 animals in 1996 to almost none in 2007.
sentences.translation: 他在那里亲眼目睹了海豚群体数量的骤减，海豚的数量从1996年的150头骤减至至2007年的几乎灭绝。

sentences.sentence: To the west of Enif, half way to the star Altair in the constellation Aquila, is Delphinus the Dolphin — one of the few constellations which actually resembles its namesake.
sentences.translation: 飞马座ε星的西面，即和飞鹰座牛郎星的中间位置上，是以海豚命名的海豚星座—因为这个星座的形状和海豚非常相似。
